lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: It's very rewarding for me to know that I am helping people to help themselves. It is an awesome feeling!
lender.occupational_info: I answer telephones, book & create appointments, and assist doctors in a medical clinic.

lender.name: Grover
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping someone to help themselves. I'm thankful that I've been given enough to share.
lender.occupational_info: I worked for the State of Georgia Social Services Department for 34 years. In that time, I did it all from direct casework to deputy director of the agency. My job for the last 10 years of my employment was in Quality Assurance doing federally mandated program reviews - a good way not to be popular.

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance
lender.occupational_info: I work with companies to help them make automobiles run better, cleaner, with more features.

lender.name: Beverly
lender.loan_because: it feels wonderful to help people help themselves. My main interest is assisting women with children to achieve sustainable careers.
lender.occupational_info: I am beginning a teaching career after earning a college degree in my 40s.

lender.name: Salvina
lender.loan_because: I want to do my part in helping others realize their dreams.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I thought it would be a small way to make a big difference in someone else's life.

lender.name: Mary Ann & Kelly
lender.loan_because: We can, and it's our true privilege to share with others and help them lead self-sufficient live. We share this as a family, and we choose each new loan with our boys, and they continue to learn more about the world by reading the profiles of the entrepreneurs, where they are from, and their descriptions.

lender.name: Travis
lender.loan_because: I enjoy sharing my resources with others
lender.occupational_info: I volunteer with the Peace Corps which was started by John F. Kennedy and is paid for by the United States government. We work with countries all over the world who ask for our help.

lender.name: Nichole
lender.loan_because: Hi!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student at the University of Pennsylvania

lender.name: kumar
lender.loan_because: community needs more support
lender.occupational_info: Being a part of a Non governmmental non profit organisation DURAISAMYGENEROUS SOCIAL EDUCATION ASSOCIATION, I work for the upliftment of the downtrodden people in the villages. We are running an orphanage for boys and girls, a High school, a Home for the Aged, Day care centre for baies, vocational Training centres and Self Hel Groups. We believe strongly that education and training will make a person financially independent.

lender.name: Mina Javaherbin
lender.loan_because: I am a part of this world, last time I checked.
lender.occupational_info: Working with words and knowledge to make the world a better place is good, but giving money to help also means love.

lender.name: Owen
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Yevgeniy
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I was born in Baku, Azerbaijan.

lender.name: Jacki
lender.loan_because: pay it forward
lender.occupational_info: I provide legal representation to preserve access to habitable and affordable housing and I represent individuals experiencing homelessness to help remove barriers to housing and employment.

lender.name: Norwin
lender.loan_because: I want to share my good fortune of being employed and having a steady income with others.
lender.occupational_info: I manage group wide regulatory and compliance projects for a multinational bank.

lender.name: Alistair
lender.loan_because: Recently returned to New Zealand after 3 years in Papua New Guinea and 10 years in Indonesia. I have seen how a small amount of money in Western terms can make a huge difference to someone in a developing country

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: The little I do can make a huge difference to those in need.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: Having travelled, fairly extensively, and seen some of the poorer areas of the 'Third World', I'd suggest that 'every little helps'; so I do it because I can.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate to have had good education and opportunities. Everybody deserves the same.
lender.occupational_info: I teach human anatomy and physiology. I am also a nurse.

lender.name: Carlos
lender.occupation: a person trying to be good

lender.name: Toni
lender.loan_because: I want to empower woman and provide financial support to assist them to become self sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: I am a 32 year old wife and mother of 2 young boys. After over 9 years of working in banking, I was diagnosed with terminal cancer and became a stay at home mother and wife. Each day is a gift and helping someone else is the best gift you can ever give.

lender.name: ann
lender.loan_because: I still have hope.
lender.occupational_info: I'm working in the operating room at a Combat Support Hospital in Baghdad.

lender.name: Nicki
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Luca and Anette
lender.loan_because: To directly assume responsibility over providing economically disadvantaged areas with additional opportunities for all to make their living.
lender.occupational_info: Luca helps governments better understand their responsibilities towards their citizens. Anette helps her children become mature, happy and responsible adults.

lender.name: Mitchs Daughter
lender.loan_because: out of His love. Luke 11:11-13.
lender.occupational_info: My job is to be good:)

lender.name: Tomasa
lender.loan_because: I like the fact that even the small amount I may be able to give can impact someone else's life and bless them.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: Starting with nothing and being given an opportunity by a stranger with a little money and faith in you is the real American ideal. It is only right to give that opportunity to people who aren't as fortunate as we are, not because of anything they did wrong, but because they happened to be born somewhere else. It feels so good to know that you don't have to have $500 or $1,000 to change someone's life. We can all pitch in a little and make a huge difference to someone we will probably never meet.
lender.occupational_info: I write and manage instructions for a team that keeps 24/7 watch on all our computer systems so we can find a problem before it starts hurting business.

lender.name: Dominic
lender.loan_because: I believe it is the will people to do something good, if they are given the opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I work in educational exchange; helping students from China find opportunities to study abroad

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: without different holes on a flute, there would be no music.....
lender.occupational_info: I work with the US Army Corps of Engineers, we are rebuilding roads, schools, hospitals, electricity generation plants and water treatment plants in Iraq.

lender.name: Dianira
lender.loan_because: the world can and will change with the mighty ripples created by our drops of donations.
lender.occupational_info: I created a method to teach Spanish to English speaking kids. I teach teachers.

lender.name: Ahmed
lender.loan_because: I have what others don't .........
lender.occupational_info: Very interesting. Love what I do. Its all about computer networking and switches and routers and the lots.

lender.name: Catarino
lender.loan_because: It's a small drop on the ocean, but many small drops makes the ocean.
lender.occupational_info: I build places in the internet for other people to communicate and help one another.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I truly believe in giving something back. I am grateful for all that I have and I feel that it is only right to share it with those who need a helping hand. Karma is a wonderful thing!

lender.name: Chuck
lender.loan_because: I want to share my assets with people less fortunate than I have been
lender.occupational_info: I design ecommerce website for a variety of clients throughout the world. I would initially like to offer my services to several people who are located anywhere, and create a website where they can market and sell their products (clothing especially) worldwide in a growing global online marketplace. If someone wants to sell their products online I would love to help them. I will donate the web domain name, hosting costs and create the site for them at no charge. Please email me if you are interested!

lender.name: Jack Pearce
lender.loan_because: I want to help entrepreneurs.

lender.name: Chuck
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving a helping hand to those who work to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am CFO to a small, privately owned manufacturing business.

lender.name: Jinny
lender.loan_because: My life is so blessed and I need to share those blessings with others so that they might have opportunities to enrich their lives and the lives of others in their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I look at information and use it to help students graduate from college.

lender.name: Scott Scriver
lender.loan_because: I have been very fortunate in life and have been looking for a way to help others. Being able to provide someone with the funding needed to help them be successful is very rewarding.
lender.occupational_info: I am a computer programmer. I have helped many start-up organizations with my skills.

lender.name: Shannon Tucker-White
lender.loan_because: "It's ALL about giving back and making a difference, even if it is to ONE person"

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: I make sure computers work for people at the many companies I service

lender.name: Colette
lender.loan_because: I feel it is important to support others that have the desire to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I am the owner of a small business IT consulting firm.

lender.name: martyn
lender.loan_because: I want to help
lender.occupational_info: office based

lender.name: Rene'
lender.loan_because: It is my way of helping someone that may need my assistance at this time. In the future, I hope they will do the same for someone else.

lender.name: Rod
lender.loan_because: I believe a small contribution of money can make a dramatic change

lender.name: Gwen
lender.loan_because: There are many people in need who are less fortunate than I and I want to help them.
lender.occupational_info: I am doing a one year public interest fellowship designed to build young leaders who are dedicated helping the city of Cleveland and its people.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: it's one way I can do something to help someone who needs it without it being "charity".

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: Small things can have big results.
lender.occupational_info: I teach elementary school children part time and work to develop data systems for a software company the rest of the time.

lender.name: Rosemary
lender.loan_because: I've had many times in my life when I've needed help and been on the receiving end; now it's time (and a privilege) to give back!
lender.occupational_info: I do direct customer contact and find it very rewarding.

lender.name: Marty
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it is to start a business without a lot of money for startup costs. Been there, done that, not fun. Hope I can make a difference by helping someone.
lender.occupational_info: I have a web design business and a coin collecting supplies business.

lender.name: Derek
lender.loan_because: You can't depend on gov'ts to pull people up. It is small businesses that employ the world!!!
lender.occupational_info: I am a financial planner. I help people plan their finances and business.

lender.name: Elaine
lender.loan_because: It's a joy to partner with businesses and people all over the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a busy office entering information on a computer. I answer lots of questions and do whatever it takes to make the office run smoothly.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I loan because I have seen true poverty.

lender.name: Piotr
lender.loan_because: I want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that creates applications for mobile devices.

lender.name: Chastina
lender.loan_because: A little can do so much.
lender.occupational_info: We are group of young professionals in New York city who are inspired by Kiva's mission. We hope to grow this group and reinvest our original capital to give other entrepreneurs a "leg up."

lender.name: Molly
lender.loan_because: While I struggle with the interest rates these people are required to pay, in the end, I feel Kiva is truly trying to help.

lender.name: Moritz
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who work hard to build a better future for themselves and their children

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: Lending is an extension of the work I have done assisting people to become more self-sufficient, through vocational counseling, and many types of volunteer work. When you help one person, you help everyone with whom they come in contact. It is personal, one to one, and it is also extended.
lender.occupational_info: When I was a vocational counselor I worked at a school advising students who were taking classes for job skills and life skills. I have continued to help students, friends, and family when a need is brought to my attention, and I seek out opportunities to volunteer in the community among those who might find this helpful. (The photo above is of my mother and myself.)

lender.name: Caroline & Colin
lender.loan_because: We want to share our wealth with others around the world, and give them the same chance that I was given, many years ago.
lender.occupational_info: We started with nothing, worked very hard, saved and slowly my business grew, and can now support my family, and share a little wealth with others not so fortunate.

lender.name: Louise and Nick
lender.loan_because: we're all tied together in this world. I'm helping a sister or brother whom I haven't ever met.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: karma

lender.name: Nora
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Willson
lender.loan_because: We like the idea of helping others in need when we have the ability to do so.
lender.occupational_info: We do financial analysis for an oil and gas exploration company.

lender.name: Nadine
lender.loan_because: I am able to. I think that we should all consistently think of ways to make life better for those in need.

lender.name: PennyCapital, LLC.
lender.loan_because: We are in the business of helping others help themselves. I think this is a great opportunity to help and Kiva.org makes it possible
lender.occupational_info: We all need each other, United we stand and can make a difference. The community coming together to help one another by micro loans to Property owners losing their homes due to the economy and changing circumstances.

lender.name: K104
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have the chance to better their own lives if they are willing to do the work.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: Everyone has the right to improve their lives and this allows me to have a small part in helping people do that.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for all I have, and wish to pay it forward to others who have needs that I can assist. Making a difference is a huge part of who I am.
lender.occupational_info: I've spent my time in the technology world, but the same time working with charities.

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: I like helping people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am an executive in an IT (technology) company, managing the operations of our data center and the technology services we provide.

lender.name: JOHN
lender.loan_because: IT FEEL'S GOOD TO HELP
lender.occupational_info: I SELL HERBS AND VITAMINS TO KEEP PEOPLE HEALTHY NATURALY

lender.name: Phil & Margot
lender.loan_because: We like to help people that will help themselves

lender.name: Shirley
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to help people who are trying to help themselves!
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired Admin. Secretary, am widowed, mother of 3, and grandmother of 6

lender.name: Raffaella Droghetti
lender.loan_because: In this fast running world, I enjoy to stop ten minutes and do something for others. Better helping people than doing shopping when online.

lender.name: Johan
lender.loan_because: It is a way for me to contribute in making the world a better place.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: :esuaceb naol I
lender.occupational_info: I help a large corporation keep the stockholders happy.

lender.name: Jenna
lender.loan_because: I want to help people empower themselves and create a future that is full of hope for themselves and their children.
lender.occupational_info: I help international students come to America to study at my University.

lender.name: Joost
lender.loan_because: It is my humble contribution to a better world. In my opinion it is also a more useful and a more respectful alternative to charity.
lender.occupational_info: I help teams developing and supporting web applications for e-commerce using Agile methods and practices (Scrum, KanBan and Extreme Programming). The ultimate goal is to improve customer experience while creating more business value too.

lender.name: Torrey
lender.loan_because: it's a simple way to help people who are trying to change their lives, and it's a great way to feel connected to people around the world!
lender.occupational_info: I work with children and families to help them cope with emotional problems.

lender.name: Dakota
lender.loan_because: Kiva facilitates hope, champions empowerment of the disenfranchised and carries a torch for a kinder and more equitable world.

lender.name: Michael McCulloch
lender.loan_because: I was in Uganda in 2007 funding a project on HIV/AIDS in one of the refugee camps. The health promoter I was with talked about her hope that one day women would have enough control over their lives to protect their own health. And one of the best ways to do this is by becoming economically independent.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the area of human rights specifically women's human rights and the right to health

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: To reach out a hand to disadvantaged and hard-working people around the world, to give something back, and as an expression of gratitude for all I have been given.
lender.occupational_info: As a paralegal, I help lawyers help people. As a writer, I mostly research and report findings, such as in legal briefs and short articles, or provide information on a given subject.

lender.name: Timothy Ciccone
lender.loan_because: In my travels photographing architecture in Asia I've seen too much poverty firsthand. It's great to help others to help themselves reach their potential.

lender.name: Ron & Melanie
lender.loan_because: We like to help others, especially those who are willing to develop a business to support themselves and their family, so that they can be self supporting.
lender.occupational_info: As a manager, recently retired, in a company which provided computer services to major global corporations, I have worked in many countries and lived for 5 years in Germany. Melanie now serves as a town councillor for Woking. This keeps her very busy and involved in the community.

lender.name: Court
lender.loan_because: I want to share and empower people who are ambitious just as my friends and family have done for me.
lender.occupational_info: I am an entrepreneur, I start businesses that help people and are environmentally friendly such as http://cleantechauthority.com

lender.name: Philip
lender.loan_because: Credit for creating appropriate community will let us all find better futures independent from misguided economic models.
lender.occupational_info: I operate a tractor for one dollar per minute. I mow brush and fields, move and work soil, as well as work in the forrest.

lender.name: Stephen and Heather
lender.loan_because: We hope to help people have better lives and futures.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying at a university so that I can go into business.

lender.name: Laura & Ryan
lender.loan_because: Once we were in the know, how could we not. We hope to help support many entrepreneurs around the world.
lender.occupational_info: Laura works for a company that provides investment / loans to entrepreneurs in the US. Ryan works for a software company.

lender.name: Kayla
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone should get a chance to help themselves, and if I can give somebody that chance, that's wonderful.

lender.name: Ronnie
lender.loan_because: I can, I should and I will.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office with windows and air condiitoning, moving food products across the US.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed with a great family

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: It is such a small thing, but it can make a world of difference!
lender.occupational_info: I am a mutual fund accountant

lender.name: NOELLA
lender.loan_because: I want to help my fellow man, woman or child.
lender.occupational_info: Enjoyable. I have a good boss and I like to figure things out.

lender.name: Asif
lender.loan_because: I can't think of a better way to help small, struggling businesses in the poorest of the poor countries. The governments there don't help neither do the banks.
lender.occupational_info: A regular guy.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping someone help themselves improve their situation. I also like reading about exactly who I'm helping - makes it more personal, makes me feel like I'm making more of a direct impact on a real person's life and it's fun reading those stories too:)
lender.occupational_info: I'm a sort of entrepreneur too: I work for my father's construction company. The company builds large homes. But I don't actually build the houses, I work in the office doing all the day-to-day bills and ordering building material.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in somebody's life.
lender.occupational_info: I write software programs.

lender.name: Janine
lender.loan_because: I am a global traveler, and this is a way to help families and individuals in far-away places.
lender.occupational_info: I bring large groups of people to Alaska for meetings, events and fun in the wilderness!

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: It takes money to make money. I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I own ClayPeople. We sell clay, glazes and equipment for creating ceramic things such as pots, plates, sculpture, and tile.

lender.name: Ben & Alena
lender.loan_because: "We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give." --Winston Churchill

lender.name: Iain
lender.loan_because: I have a comfortable life in the UK, I hope to help others to attain the same.
lender.occupational_info: I drive a lorry with a crane on it to load and off-load.

lender.name: Marko
lender.loan_because: It is a nice and smart way to make a real difference. Helping someone far away so practically makes me happy.
lender.occupational_info: My work deals with the small-scale carbon sink projects (with integrated biodiversity and local development aspects) in developing countries. I am also interested in the questions related to preventing deforestation and rehabilitating degraded forests in developing countries.

lender.name: Empowerment Lenders
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference....

lender.name: amanda
lender.loan_because: i feel that others need the money more then me
lender.occupational_info: i love animals

lender.name: Derek
lender.loan_because: Why not? It's interesting to see such little money allow another individual or group to do so much more with it than I would.
lender.occupational_info: Help large companies with their meetings, symposiums, trade shows, etc. in terms of audio/visual components.

lender.name: Fernando
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of giving without the expectation of getting anything in return.

lender.name: Jay and Denise
lender.loan_because: It's wonderful to know that you can help someone make a better life for themselves and their families.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do. Individuals can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell real estate - homes and land.

lender.name: Luke Atencio
lender.loan_because: James 2:15. its a way to love my brothers and sisters. everyone on this planet is made in the image of God, we are all a family.
lender.occupational_info: i am a musician and an artist.

lender.name: Daina
lender.loan_because: Someone out there needs my help, and I know one day when I need the help, someone out there will help me too. :)
lender.occupational_info: I'm just a student working a meaningless job to get through it all.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I feel as though the world needs help. In helping these entrepreneurs build up their businesses, we can help their economy tremendously. We are empowering these people by lending our money to them. We're saying, yes you can do it, you can live your dream. A little goes a long way. "Feed a man a fish and he'll eat for a day, teach a man to fish and he'll eat forever."

lender.name: Thi
lender.loan_because: bums stick together
lender.occupational_info: package subprime mortgages (pleasedont judge me)

lender.name: Louis
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do

lender.name: Judith Chapman
lender.loan_because: Kiva has made it possible.
lender.occupational_info: The stars of Daytime TV and Happy Hour Productions performed "The Trial of the Catonsville 9." They gave of their time and donated all of the money raised from tickets sold to Kiva. For more about the play, go to judithchapman.com.

lender.name: Rolf
lender.loan_because: you shoud too

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: Starting a business is really tough - and a lack of money should not restrict one's innovation or prohibit someone from achieving their dream

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Anna Lisa
lender.loan_because: It gives me joy.

lender.name: JC and Kellie
lender.loan_because: I believe that if one is given the right oppurtunity they will achieve success and therefore be able to share in their success
lender.occupational_info: Design and build roads, signals, bridges, and land development that improves the quality of life and world access

lender.name: Lekan
lender.loan_because: The individual can be empowered to change a society.
lender.occupational_info: I study organizational structure and theory, and also work in computer science, especially in artificial intelligence and computational biology.

lender.name: * sami jo*
lender.occupational_info: I work with the team designing the Orange County Great Park in Irvine CA.

lender.name: bryana
lender.loan_because: Karma

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I have been so lucky to have had so many opportunities in my life and I want others to have a chance to achieve their potential. I believe everyone can make a difference and everyone has an obligation to try and make the world a better place.

lender.name: MICHAEL
lender.loan_because: I want to change someones life for the better
lender.occupational_info: I work with troubled adolescents that may have been abused or addicted to drugs

lender.name: Ignacio
lender.loan_because: if you pick borrowers well you can just keep lending that $100 on and on to make a big difference to many - I like to pick those that want money for capital because that way they can be empowered and pay back. I avoid unhealthy things like lend to soda sellers

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: Its a great feeling to be able to learn of other peoples lives across the globe. To know that in some small way I can give back for all I have recieved in my life. This is a hand up, not a hand out. How many of us can actually say we work as hard, under such circumstances?
lender.occupational_info: I assist in taking care of handicapped people. Helping them to be as independent as possible in their daily lives. I have learned much more from them then they have from me!

lender.name: swirkus
lender.loan_because: I lend because it is a way to repay some of the generosity I have received throughout my life and also because I feel it is the least I can do considering I had the good fortune to be born in such a prosperous country.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: It helps
lender.occupational_info: Numbers

lender.name: Christin & Scott
lender.loan_because: We want to make a positive difference in the lives of others.

lender.name: Jenn
lender.loan_because: People have helped me to achieve my goals, and I want to pay it forward.

lender.name: Olatunji and Omara
lender.loan_because: It's our own small way of reaching out in Christian love to those less fortunate than we are.

lender.name: Sheila
lender.loan_because: I heard Muhammad Yunus speak last year at Vanderbilt University and was greatly inspired. Months later I read about KIVA in Spirit Magazine on board a Southwest Airlines flight. After reading this article I knew that a portion of my paycheck would go toward KIVA. We are so fortunate in our country to have abundance and opportunity, it seems simple to share.
lender.occupational_info: I work with other women in a large kitchen putting together meals for large gatherings, meetings, social events. We use fresh, in-season ingredients, and grow our own herbs that we use in the recipes. We put the prepared food in our cars and transport it to the event site.

lender.name: Jen
lender.loan_because: it's a good thing to do.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: it might help
lender.occupational_info: I encourage people to love God and do what He says, the best thing they can do for themselves

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because:
I am thankful for all that has been provided for me by my family and honored to be living in a country that cares about the global community.
I know that hard work is not always enough and am glad to be a catalyst in change for people who dream of making their lives and their community better.
lender.occupational_info: Manage projects for IT (computers) deployments globally.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I am disabled and live on a fixed income. This is something I can do on my income to make life better for someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I was a registered nurse in an intensive care unit for 30 years.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I have a small business, and it makes me happy to use some of my profits to help others grow their businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I design, make & sell knitwear, other clothing & accessories, and jewelry.

lender.name: Josie
lender.loan_because: It contributes to giving people who need just a little help become successful individuals in whatever path they are on.
lender.occupational_info: I work in outdoor education. I take adolescents on 3-4 week trips in the wilderness to help them better understand themselves, others, and the world around them.

lender.name: chris
lender.loan_because: I want to help others have a better life, especially children.
lender.occupational_info: I am a partner in a company that provides real estate development services and asset management for investors.

lender.name: Canyon Vista
lender.loan_because: It is everyone's responcibility to give.

lender.name: Tyler
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I teach yoga to other people to improve their health and well-being.

lender.name: Amye
lender.loan_because: to help be Christ's hands in the world

lender.name: Krishan
lender.loan_because: This is my birthday present - I am now five and my parents would like me to help

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: As a former Peace Corps Volunteer, I know that relatively small amounts of money can make a difference in people's lives ...and we are, indeed, all connected.
lender.occupational_info: As a psychologist, my job is to help people suffering from emotional distress. I am married and have two grown sons.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I am so happy to have the opportunity to give back to a few of the amazing people in countries I've visited and loved, and I appreciate that Kiva gives the full amount of the loan to the entrepreneur.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I would hope someone would do the same for me.

lender.name: Rebekkah
lender.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur myself and recognize the difference between a "hand-up" and a "hand-out".
lender.occupational_info: My company designs and builds web sites to help businesses reach customers in new and creative ways.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: We are blessed

lender.name: Jacqueline
lender.loan_because: I want to do my small part to help others help themselves.

lender.name: Linda
lender.occupation: I run an Office Services Company
lender.loan_because: Sometimes, all one needs, is one small show of faith, and they become the person they were always meant to be. I loan because I'd like to think that I can help someone improve their lives on what I could have spent in ten minutes buying something that I don't even need. I do, becaues I can, and thank the good Lord everyday, because it truely is better to give than to recieve. I'm not even remotely well off but compared to what I've seen I'm rich beyond words.
lender.occupational_info: I handle many of the office needs of a small trucking firm that moves Mobile Homes across the USA. I do everything from billing to taking phone calls, optaining permits, and many other things that come along on any given day.

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: corinne
lender.loan_because: I am a believer...that, "we must be the change we wish to see in the world" ~ Mahatma Gandhi
lender.occupational_info:
In my work, I help people with physical disabilities become more functionally independent and capable in their daily living skills. I work for a community based non-profit organization with the core philosophy and fervent mission to help adults and seniors with disability attain adequate medical care and support services for their well being; and, to be able to remain living sustainably in their own community.
In my lifepath, simply put: I am an ordinary person wanting to see our humanity live and breathe its âsacredâ meaning, purpose, and belonging. . .

lender.name: Stacy
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hospital.

lender.name: Rudy
lender.loan_because: We all need to help each other out, this site alone should prove that one person can make a difference in someone's life!!!

lender.name: Victoria
lender.loan_because: I hope for a better world

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: Sharing for a friendlier world.

lender.name: Spencer Chris Sammie
lender.loan_because: We want to share our blessings and gifts to help others have a better life just like Uncle Reb does.
lender.occupational_info: We are students. We go to school and love to play sports and dance.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: God has given my family much more than we deserve. I hope to spread my good fortune to others.
lender.occupational_info: Lending money in the US

lender.name: Oleg
lender.loan_because: the world is what we make of it...
lender.occupational_info: aerospace engineering student

lender.name: Virginia
lender.loan_because: I WANT TO HELP
lender.occupational_info: I DESIGN AND BUILD SWIMMING POOLS FOR COMPANIES AND INDIVIDUALS

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: why wouldn't you if you could.
lender.occupational_info:
I design things, mostly on the computer. Usually print material and websites.
I also paint, play music and enjoy cooking for my family.

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: i was born in Thailand and came to the US when i was 9. I know what it's like to live in a 3rd world country struggling.
lender.occupational_info: i make coffee.

lender.name: Carol and K9 Meg
lender.loan_because: I believe in economies of scale, or rather, scaling economy for the betterment of people who are otherwise disenfranchised from large economic systems. It's grassroots "people to people" networking.
lender.occupational_info: Coffee roasting is my second career after 35 years as a wildlife /fisheries biologist. Roasting brings me closer to coffee producers, who are like the recipients of these microloans. Roasting specialty coffees enables me to educate my coffee customers about the people to whom they owe their beverage .

lender.name: Tiana
lender.loan_because: I like knowing that I may have a small impact on someone's chance to improve their and their family's financial well-being.

lender.name: Vicki
lender.loan_because: My family is very blessed. We have plenty of food and clothing, and a cozy house. It's good to share what we have.
lender.occupational_info: I support a team of technicians who maintain the equipment used in hospitals (ventilators, IV pumps, surgical equipment, etc.).

lender.name: Johnny
lender.loan_because: things are meant to be better.
lender.occupational_info: help people retire with integrity ~ retirement consulting.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I believe in starting small and building to bigger things. I believe in trust and in good nature. I believe that win/win relationships exist. I loan because it works.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a variety of fields including manufacturing and Environmental and Socially responsible media.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: We must all invest in each others hopes and dreams for our world to profit as a whole. This is such an incredible way to share resources! I am blessed to be a part of this!

lender.name: Georgina Kaye
lender.loan_because: We make a living by what we get, we make a life by what we give. ~Sir Winston Churchill

lender.name: Erica
lender.loan_because: I am making steps to become a better, truly happier person. Instead of giving to something short term like feeding starving children (which is very important!), I figured that I would contribute to something that makes progress (Once you give money to unicef or something, the children will still be hungry after your contribution is all spent.) I figured why not contribute to something that has the chance of making the world a more prosperous place?
lender.occupational_info: I'm a working college student and barely making it! Even though I'm not super wealthy, I can contribute, because I know that not everyone has the same opportunities that I do.

lender.name: Alison
lender.loan_because: received a gift certificate

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a multi national confectionary company.

lender.name: Arnav
lender.loan_because: of child in me, who wants a beautiful world, full of happiness.

lender.name: Ugi
lender.loan_because: It brings good karma.
lender.occupational_info: I help people market their products and services effectively.

lender.name: Sung June
lender.occupational_info: Biomedical Engineering to Help Sensory and Motion Impaired People

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I can and because I thing it's a great idea. Plus I want to become more engaged in microfinance and work in developing countries

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: It's a way for me to feel in contact with individuals around the world, with no bureaucracy to get in the way.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher of English to children ages 14 and 18.

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: I want to help people achieve their goals.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I would like to think that a community of microlending can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: My work, involves working with people to improve manufacturing processes.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I love the concept of assisting entrepreneurs with small loans that are paid back--especially considering how much further money can go in "third world" regions.
lender.occupational_info: A former English teacher, I now write/edit educational materials for a small IT company.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: I am blessed by God with many gifts and wish to share with others throuugh the use of my time, talents, and resources.

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: I've had so many people in my life help me.
lender.occupational_info: Saving the salmon, helping to protect, restore, and enhance the environment!

lender.name: The Butler-Dash family
lender.occupation: A family interested in helping others
lender.loan_because: We are fortunate to have good health and a happy life. We would like to help others to have the same if we can.
lender.occupational_info: Joel (husband/father) helps companies around the world get the products they make to their customers faster and more cheaply. Toni (wife/mother) cares for their young children (Grace and Gabriel) and their home.

lender.name: Gabriel
lender.loan_because: Self-Sustainability - give people the opportunity to help themselves
lender.occupational_info: Director - DE BEERS DIAMOND JEWELLERS Discover our timelessly elegant designs created with meticulous craftsmanship, as we bring to life the diamond dream of eternally feminine jewellery, based on 120 years of expertise!

lender.name: roxana
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: nora
lender.loan_because: i want to support women in their endeavours, and this program makes total sense.
lender.occupational_info: i make patchwork quilts that tell stories about the people who will use them.

lender.name: Todd
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to pursue their dreams. An opportunity to contribute to that pursuit is exciting.
lender.occupational_info: I am a portfolio manager for a wealth management group working primarily with individuals and their investments.

lender.loan_because: Simply, to make a difference in someoneâs life.
lender.occupational_info: easy, fun, rewarding and worth doing

lender.name: Jamie

lender.occupational_info: I am the District Manager of 11 retail stores located in 3 different states.

lender.name: Neil
lender.loan_because: I can and I want to help people improve the quality of their lives.
lender.occupational_info: Software Test Manager

lender.name: Lowe Funding Group
lender.loan_because: I can. I loan to help enable people obtain their dreams when they might not otherwise be given the chance. I know there are a lot of less fortunate people in the world but that doesn't mean that they are less of a person or a member of society. I loan to help create equality among people.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an insurance company in the Information Technology department. My work consists of project planning and deployment, research and development, and supporting applications that I am responsible for.

lender.name: suji
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone should have an opportunity to succeed in life. I also believe in Jesus and He calls us to help those in need.
lender.occupational_info: I design structures for large companies for special events.

lender.name: Han and Glen
lender.loan_because: we like to support the work that others do for their family and community
lender.occupational_info: We work in a university laboratory doing research to understand biology and human disease

lender.name: Monique
lender.loan_because: This is such a clever way to help people. And helping someone expand their ability to make a living has a greater impact in so many ways. It feels good that what little I have can do so much.

lender.name: Josh
lender.occupational_info: Hello.

lender.name: Nola
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to make a living, and to know that a person can reach out and help others dreams come true is a privilege and honor.
lender.occupational_info: I helped care for sick people.

lender.name: Cameron
lender.loan_because: I had 200 dollars and I wanted to share some of it through Kiva.

lender.name: Lydia & Travis
lender.loan_because: We are so very blessed by the Lord

lender.name: Lawrence
lender.loan_because: It feels good to be able to help in any way possible to anyone who is trying to better their lives...more than likely...trying to better lives of loved ones more so than their own.
lender.occupational_info: I bring medicines to facilities that care for the elderly when they can no longer care for themselves.

lender.name: Emma
lender.loan_because: The world isn't changed for the better through committees, through imposing new regimes or systems. The world is changed by individuals acting out of compassion, and choosing to be generous.

lender.name: Bob Bennett
lender.loan_because: I want to help people and learn more about micro lending. Long term I want to create a platform similar to this one that not only provides the capital for micro businesses but also the education, training, and expertise for mirco businesses to be as successful as possible, in other words micro business building.
lender.occupational_info: My business invests in small privately held businesses and acts as their coach and mentor to help them be more successful.

lender.name: luwangula
lender.loan_because: To put the knowledge acquired in school to use, and swim across the poverty/unemployment river
lender.occupational_info:
I hold a bachelors degree in Food Science and Technology, obtained locally in my Countries best university. Unemployment is a global issue. However, we acquire knowledge from institutions enough to self employ but without any capital
Am starting a number on personal businesses where I can employ others as a mitigation to fight poverty.
I intend to start poultry business on medium scale, as well as a wholesale/retail pharmacy in my home town. I need $3000 to succeed.
Any level of assistance is welcome. God bless

lender.name: Anton
lender.occupational_info: Import-Export Company

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate to have had people help me out along the way and I wanted to pass that along.
lender.occupational_info: I provide Pre-Employment and Tenant Screening Services

lender.name: Evi
lender.loan_because: a little bit goes a long way.

lender.name: Lyle
lender.loan_because: While I also give charitably to meet immediate needs, encouraging entrepreneurialism and development is a long-term, sustainable solution for people in the majoirty world to address their own challenges.
lender.occupational_info: I work with a NGO that helps people grow in their inner life of Christian spirituality and outer life of compassion in the world.

lender.name: Josh & Louise
lender.loan_because: We have created businesses and know how difficult it is especially in areas where there is little chance for financial backing. Proud to be a part of this.

lender.name: Saleem Sheikh
lender.loan_because:
Give something back to the community and to help those who are less fortunate than us.
It will make you feel good and you will help someone stand on their own feet.
âGive someone a fish and you feed him for a day; Teach someone to fish and you help them to feed themselves for ever"
Go ahead and do it ! Now!

lender.name: Shane
lender.loan_because: Sharing is important, in all sortsa ways.

lender.name: Amal
lender.loan_because: I want to help dedicated people and their family become self sufficient and healthy in body and mind.

lender.name: Rotem
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Kishore
lender.loan_because: I like to help people who can change their lives by token help from us. If everyone did this, we can eradicate poverty from the world and also give smiles to the unfortunates. We are living a previlaged life, let us help someone to better their life!
lender.occupational_info: I create dreams for others - one of the most expensive item that anyone buys in their lifetime. Our work in construction creates beautiful homes that people want to live in.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: I'm lucky enough that I can; when we loan we spread care, respect and understanding.
lender.occupational_info: After studying gastronomy at the Slow Food-supported University of Gastronomic Sciences in Parma, Italy, I obtained my degree in Digital Filmmaking. Now, I write, produce and direct films and videos in the Boston area, many of which make use of my food education including some local promotional material for Slow Food Boston.

lender.name: StacyB

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: you can help change someones life for less than what most people spend in one month on cable TV

lender.name: Jaika
lender.loan_because: I am incredibly excited to be part of a system that allows many people to join together to help others move forward with their businesses and with their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I own a small tutoring business called 'Tutoring for Success'. I help children learn to read.

It also is a loan ... not a "charity" ... the entrepreneurs have self-respect and dignity, and are not beholded to anyone.
lender.occupational_info: I do health-care copywriting. To find my website, Google using the three words: internet, writing and net. However put an hyphen between the first two words, and a period between the last two words. (I am trying to avoid spam here!)

lender.name: Appleby Arts
lender.loan_because: We enjoy the stories and helping people that want to help themselves.

lender.name: Esben
lender.loan_because: My money does better work in the hands of those who need them, than in my bank account.

lender.occupational_info: I help people protect their businesses from fire, theft and accidents.

lender.occupational_info: We provide advice to companies when those companies undertake large change. We are also very involved in our small rural community near Chautauqua New York.

lender.name: Dawn & Jeff
lender.loan_because: There are all manor of ways that you can give "assistance" to others...but not all of them allow people to retain their self respect and individuality in the process. Kiva does.
lender.occupational_info: I purchase items for resale for a catalog company and my husband helps people with drug and achohol abuse problems.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because:
I'm lucky enough to have had all the opportunities in the world in terms of country, education, jobs etc.
If the only thing that's standing between the lender and prosperity is not their own hard work and efforts, but the lack of a tool that I have, then.....
lender.occupational_info: I work to provide tools to mathematicians / financial traders to better analyse financial markets

lender.name: Marcelo
lender.loan_because: I like to help those who need a little boost to move forward.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people who have real needs.
lender.occupational_info: I am a photographer who travels to peoples homes to take their pictures.
